# Microscopy

The [UHCOP Core]([https://uh.edu/pharmacy/research/core-lab/)](https://uh.edu/pharmacy/research/core-lab/)) houses a [Confocal]([https://www.leica-microsystems.com/products/confocal-microscopes/p/stellaris-sted/),](https://www.leica-microsystems.com/products/confocal-microscopes/p/stellaris-sted/),) [NMR]([https://www.jeolusa.com/PRODUCTS/Nuclear-Magnetic-Resonance/JNM-ECZL-series-FT-NMR),](https://www.jeolusa.com/PRODUCTS/Nuclear-Magnetic-Resonance/JNM-ECZL-series-FT-NMR),) [LCMS]([https://sciex.com/products/mass-spectrometers/triple-quad-systems/triple-quad-5500-system),](https://sciex.com/products/mass-spectrometers/triple-quad-systems/triple-quad-5500-system),) [ddPCR]([https://www.bio-rad.com/en-us/life-science/digital-pcr/qx200-ddpcr-system-with-automated-droplet-generator),](https://www.bio-rad.com/en-us/life-science/digital-pcr/qx200-ddpcr-system-with-automated-droplet-generator),) [chromatography]([https://www.bionity.com/en/products/128437/aekta-pure-flexible-andintuitive-protein-purification-system.html),](https://www.bionity.com/en/products/128437/aekta-pure-flexible-andintuitive-protein-purification-system.html),) and a [biolayer interferometer]([https://www.sartorius.com/en/products/protein-analysis/octet-bli-detection/octet-label-free-detection-systems)](https://www.sartorius.com/en/products/protein-analysis/octet-bli-detection/octet-label-free-detection-systems))
